ai-tha-ap225:1.1_0: I used to be in a sorry state.
ai-tha-ap225:3.1_0: This is the proper thing that I gained,
ai-tha-ap225:3.4_0: for realizing the goal of the present life.
ai-tha-ap225:4.3_0: My hands and feet used to be soft,
ai-tha-ap225:4.4_0: who sees the subtle truth of wisdom.
ai-tha-ap225:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap225:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap225:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable treasure.
ai-tha-ap225:9.1_0: there are two kinds of gems, the senior monks, and the third following.
